text: Þis his þara V hida boc æt Dydylingetune and þas anes hiwisces æt uddingc þe Eadwig cing gebocode Ælfrede his þeine on eche yrfe.
Þis sint þare V hida landgemære to dydylingtune & þas syxtan æt udding þe þær to gebyreð.
Ærest on roddan pol nioþeweardne.
And of roddan pole on þane langan hlinc.
And of þan langan hlince on fugelan pæþ.
From fugelan paþe on þa twegen ærcas þær boddingc weg ut gæð.
And from bodding wege ofer þane redan weg.
And of þam readan wege on lindune estawearde þær to þam ealdan wege.
And swa andlang weges to mearc broces heafde.
From mearc broces heafde.
Andlang weges in an cheoles byrig eastgete.
And of þam estgete eft ut æt þam westgeate.
And of þam westgeate on dydeling dune middewearde.
And of dydeling dune on þa haran apuldran.
And of þære haran apuldran þære adune innan winburnan oð midne stream.
And swa andlang streames oþ roddan pol.
And at crawan forda synd VI mæd æcras þe þær to gebyriað & on ige twegen.
And þis sint þæs hywisces landgemære æt udding.
Ærest on cucan dene.
And of cucan dune on cranmor middeweardne.
And of cranmore on þæne heal.
And of þam heale on þa fulan lake.
And of þære fulen lake on secg broc.
And up þanan andlang brokes oþ þa brydenan bricgge.
And of þare brycgge andlang weges on ham woldes þorn.
And of ham woldes þorne on cucan.
And on ige II mæd æcres þær to.
